problem.markdown: Which of the following systems can be considered incompressible for many practical purposes? [x] A bottle completely filled with water, and sealed. [x] A piece of solid gold. [ ] A balloon containing nitrogen. [ ] A cylinder-piston arrangement containing carbon dioxide.
problem.p: Which of the following systems can be considered incompressible for many practical purposes?

checkboxgroup.choice: A bottle completely filled with water, and sealed.
A cylinder-piston arrangement containing carbon dioxide.
